eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class WauzPlayerGuild

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerGuild

  • public class WauzPlayerGuild
extends java.lang.Object
    A player guild loaded from a config file. Also contains static methods for managing all guilds.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • createGuild

        public static boolean createGuild(org.bukkit.entity.Player leader,
                                  java.lang.String guildName)
        Creates a new guild. The leader must be in a MMORPG world and cannot already be in a guild. 300 Tokens are required for the guild creation.
        Parameters:
        leader - The leader of the new guild.
        guildName - A guild name, that does not already exists, between 1 and 42 chars.
        Returns:
        If the guild creation command had valid syntax.

      • applyForGuild

        public static boolean applyForGuild(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String guildName)
        Sends a guild application. The player must be in a MMORPG world and cannot already be in a guild. All online guild members will receive a notification.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that wants to join a guild.
        guildName - The name of the guild.
        Returns:
        If the guild apply command had valid syntax.

      • isNameTaken

        Parameters:
        guildName - The name of the guild.
        Returns:
        If it is taken.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)

        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove.
